reviewText: After viewing all available videos for learning to play the didgeridoo, this one is undoubtedly the best. Zackary, the instructor, gives extremely clear instructions and demonstrates exactly how to proceed, step by step. it is like having a personal instructor. There is a wealth of instructional material here, enough to work with for a long time. I think anyone who makes the effort to put the principles and techniques into practice can develop the ability to circular breathe.
